reviewText:
I can see this being something that Spike Jonze saw once and then decided to never tell anyone about cause he was gonna mine material from it for the rest of his career. No joke. It's pretty ahead of it's time. Think the Prisoner but you're stuck in a sitcom and everyone can hear your internal monologue while goofy things happen. Maybe, you could also think of it as Being Peter Sellers with a bit of The Truman Show tossed in.

Either way there's not a lot to say about it other than it's worth tracking down. I got it here on amazon for 14 dollars with shipping. So, it's cheap too for international standards
